name: map-animation
description: Indiana Jones style map animation with Puppeteer

scripts.smooth: ffmpeg -y -i map-animation.mp4 -vf 'minterpolate=fps=60:mi_mode=mci:mc_mode=aobmc:me_mode=bidir:vsbmc=1' -c:v libx264 -pix_fmt yuv420p -preset slow -crf 18 -movflags +faststart map-animation-smooth.mp4
scripts.oldfilm: ffmpeg -y -i map-animation.mp4 -vf 'noise=alls=20:allf=t+u,colorchannelmixer=.393:.769:.189:0:.349:.686:.168:0:.272:.534:.131,eq=contrast=1.1:brightness=0.05:saturation=0.8,curves=vintage' -c:v libx264 -pix_fmt yuv420p -preset slow -crf 18 -movflags +faststart map-animation-oldfilm.mp4
